member.name: T:JetBrains.Platform.Tests.TextControl.Components.TestImplStandaloneTextControlSwitchingGraphicsProvider

member.name: T:JetBrains.TestFramework.TextControl.TestTextControlFocusSupport
member.summary: relies on WinForms for focus management in real life. In tests, we emulate this by manually applying focus whenever smb attempts to change it.
